description: American chipmaker Microchip Technology Incorporated has disclosed that a cyberattack impacted its systems over the weekend, disrupting operations across multiple manufacturing facilities. [...]
title: Microchip Technology discloses cyberattack impacting operations

description: Microsoft has launched a new unified Teams application that allows Windows and Mac users to switch between personal, work, and education accounts without installing multiple apps. [...]
title: Microsoft launches unified Teams app for personal, work accounts

description: Unknown attackers have deployed a newly discovered backdoor dubbed Msupedge on a university's Windows systems in Taiwan, likely by exploiting a recently patched PHP remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-4577). [...]
title: Hackers use PHP exploit to backdoor Windows systems with new malware

description: Oregon Zoo is informing that visitors who purchased tickets online between December and June had their payment card information compromised. [...]
title: Oregon Zoo warns visitors their credit card details were stolen

description: According to user reports following this month's Patch Tuesday, the August 2024 Windows updates are breaking dual boot on some Linux systems with Secure Boot enabled. [...]
title: August Windows updates break dual boot on some Linux systems

description: A hacker compromised Unicoin's Google Workspace (formerly G-Suite) account and changed the passwords for all company employees, locking them out of their corporate accounts for days. [...]
title: Hacker locks Unicoin staff out of Google accounts for 4 days

description: The U.S. government is warning of increased effort from Iran to influence upcoming elections through cyber operations targeting Presidential campaigns and the American public. [...]
title: US warns of Iranian hackers escalating influence operations

description: The notorious North Korean Lazarus hacking group exploited a zero-day flaw in the Windows AFD.sys driver to elevate privileges and install the FUDModule rootkit on targeted systems. [...]
title: Windows driver zero-day exploited by Lazarus hackers to install rootkit
